description: Data was extracted from TCGA DCC on February 2017. RPPA/protein qualification data for TCGA samples was extracted by the NCI GDC in the legacy archive specifically the files with names like "MDA_RPPA_Core.protein_expression.Level_3". Note: A significant amount of manual curation of the gene and protein symbols was done. More details: https://bioinformatics.mdanderson.org/public-software/tcpa/. It has been copied to isb-cgc-bq.TCGA_versioned.protein_expression_hg38_gdc_2017_02. Please see isb-cgc-bq.TCGA.protein_expression_hg38_gdc_current for the most current table.

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Gene name e.g. TTN, DDR1, etc.
fields.name: gene_name

fields.description: If the antibody targets a phosphorylated protein, this field will contain that information, eg pS473  --  otherwise this field will be null
fields.name: phospho

fields.description: Protein symbol with phosphorylation status, eg ACC_pS79
fields.name: protein_name

fields.description: Expression level of protein as measured by reverse-phase protein arrays. https://bioinformatics.mdanderson.org/public-software/tcpa/
fields.name: protein_expression

fields.description: Animal of origin for the antibody M (Mouse), R (Rabbit), G (Goat)
fields.name: antibody_source

fields.description: Validation status of antibody by correlation of RPPA data with Western blot, V E C (https://bioinformatics.mdanderson.org/public-software/mclp/)
fields.name: validation_status
